title: How Much of THE KING OF STATEN ISLAND Is True? | Pete Davidson's Life
author: Think Story
comment: Man, was really looking forward to Ariana Grande being the Queen of Staten Island.
Y is Steve Buscemi so randomly dynamic. Him being a fireman is so fucking random and amazing and cool. I love him.
I really liked the movie! The plot was better than what I had assumed from the trailer.
Pete will look like Steve Buscemi when he grows up!!
I liked your take on this. Look forward to your material. Definitely appreciate all of the hard work and effort you put into these critiques!
description:
In this video we take a look at Judd Apatow's latest film THE KING OF STATEN ISLAND starring Pete Davidson and how true or fake it is to real life.
